name: City Adventure
description:
City Adventure is a short but entertaining one-time story about a guy that ventures outside of the city to find its corresponding place in the world.

This game was made in the first UJI GameJam in roughly 30 hours.

It is completely free to download and play as-is, however, if you'd like to give a shoutout to our humble work, feel free to donate when downloading it!

Made by:

@Alberto_vgdd

@hipergravido

@ShutUpJonatan

@Iumadatraca

@MrSalvapapa
